article.Heading: Hyundai cuts prices up to 5.9% post GST
article.Summary: "The rate of reduction varies from state to state across the car range depending on the earlier VAT rates. The price reduction will be up to 5.9 per cent ex-showroom Delhi," Hyundai Motor India said in a statement. The new prices are effective from July 1, 2017, it added.
article.Body:
Hyundai Motor India today said it has reduced prices of its vehicles by up to 5.9 per cent to pass on GST benefit to customers.

"The rate of reduction varies from state to state across the car range depending on the earlier VAT rates. The price reduction will be up to 5.9 per cent ex-showroom Delhi," Hyundai Motor India said in a statement. The new prices are effective from July 1, 2017, it added.
